control_osd.v

00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief On-Screen-Display and overall system management.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief control_osd.v
00030 */
00031 module control_osd(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input               CLK_I,
00035     input               reset_n,
00036     output              reset_request,
00037     output reg          management_mode,
00038     //% @}
00039     
00040     //% \name WISHBONE master

00041     //% @{
00042     output reg          CYC_O,
00043     output reg          STB_O,
00044     output reg          WE_O,
00045     output reg [31:2]   ADR_O,
00046     output [3:0]        SEL_O,
00047     output reg [31:0]   master_DAT_O,
00048     input [31:0]        master_DAT_I,
00049     input               ACK_I,
00050     //% @}
00051     
00052     //% \name WISHBONE slave

00053     //% @{
00054     input [31:2]        ADR_I,
00055     input               CYC_I,
00056     input               WE_I,
00057     input               STB_I,
00058     input [3:0]         SEL_I,
00059     input [31:0]        slave_DAT_I,
00060     output [31:0]       slave_DAT_O,
00061     output reg          ACK_O,
00062     output              RTY_O,
00063     output              ERR_O,
00064     //% @}
00065     
00066     //% \name On-Screen-Display management interface

00067     //% @{
00068     input               request_osd,
00069     output reg          on_screen_display,
00070     
00071     input [4:0]         osd_line,
00072     input [4:0]         osd_column,
00073     output [7:0]        character,
00074     
00075     output reg          joystick_enable,
00076     input               keyboard_select,
00077     input               keyboard_up,
00078     input               keyboard_down,
00079     //% @}
00080     
00081     //% \name On-Screen-Display floppy management interface

00082     //% @{
00083     output              floppy_inserted,
00084     output reg [31:0]   floppy_sector,
00085     output reg          floppy_write_enabled,
00086     input               floppy_error
00087     //% @}
00088 );
00089 
00090 assign ERR_O = 1'b0;
00091 assign RTY_O = 1'b0;
00092 assign SEL_O = 4'b1111;
00093 
00094 //****************** Display memory
00095 wire [31:0] char;
00096 wire [31:0] display_q;
00097 assign slave_DAT_O = ({ADR_I, 2'b00} >= 32'h10000000 && {ADR_I, 2'b00} <= 32'h10000FFF)? display_q : 32'd0;
00098 
00099 altsyncram display_ram_inst(
00100     .clock0(CLK_I),
00101     .clock1(CLK_I),
00102     .address_a(ADR_I[11:2]),
00103     .wren_a(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && {ADR_I, 2'b00} >= 32'h10000000 && {ADR_I, 2'b00} <= 32'h10000FFF),
00104     .data_a(slave_DAT_I),
00105     .byteena_a(SEL_I),
00106     .q_a(display_q),
00107     .address_b(char_addr[11:2]),
00108     .q_b(char)
00109 );
00110 defparam display_ram_inst.operation_mode = "BIDIR_DUAL_PORT";
00111 defparam display_ram_inst.width_a = 32;
00112 defparam display_ram_inst.widthad_a = 10;
00113 defparam display_ram_inst.width_byteena_a = 4;
00114 defparam display_ram_inst.width_b = 32;
00115 defparam display_ram_inst.widthad_b = 10;
00116 defparam display_ram_inst.init_file = "control_osd.mif";
00117 
00118 wire [7:0] final_char;
00119 assign final_char =
00120     (char_addr[1:0] == 2'd0)? char[31:24] :
00121     (char_addr[1:0] == 2'd1)? char[23:16] :
00122     (char_addr[1:0] == 2'd2)? char[15:8] :
00123     char[7:0];
00124 
00125 assign character = (osd_line == 5'd9 && final_char != 8'd0)? {1'b1, final_char[6:0]} : final_char;
00126 
00127 //***************** Control
00128 reg [7:0] pointer;
00129 reg [7:0] selected_floppy_pointer;
00130 
00131 reg [31:0] value_a;
00132 reg [31:0] value_b;
00133 
00134 reg [1:0] value_counter;
00135 reg [4:0] last_osd_column;
00136 
00137 reg last_keyboard_up;
00138 reg last_keyboard_down;
00139 reg last_keyboard_select;
00140 reg last_request_osd;
00141 
00142 reg [22:0] keyboard_counter;
00143 reg keyboard_repeating;
00144 wire keyboard_repeat;
00145 assign keyboard_repeat = (keyboard_repeating == 1'b0 && keyboard_counter == 23'd6000000) || (keyboard_repeating == 1'b1 && keyboard_counter == 23'd1000000);
00146 
00147 wire [12:0] current_addr;
00148 assign current_addr = {3'b0, osd_line, 5'b0} - 13'd64 + { pointer, 5'b0 };
00149 wire [12:0] selected_floppy_addr;
00150 assign selected_floppy_addr = { 3'b0, 5'd9, 5'b0 } - 13'd64 + { selected_floppy_pointer, 5'b0 };
00151 
00152 wire [11:0] char_addr;
00153 assign char_addr =
00154     ((value_counter == 2'd1)?   5'd24 :
00155      (value_counter > 2'd1)?    5'd28 :
00156      (osd_column == 5'd31)?     12'd0 : osd_column + 5'd1
00157     ) +
00158     ((osd_line == 5'd0 && state != S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY)?    12'd0 :
00159      (osd_line == 5'd0 && state == S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY)?    12'd160 :
00160      
00161      (osd_line == 5'd1 && state == S_SD_CHECK_INIT)?        12'd32 :
00162      (osd_line == 5'd1 && state == S_SD_ERROR)?             12'd64 :
00163      (osd_line == 5'd1 && state == S_SELECT_ROM)?           12'd96 :
00164      (osd_line == 5'd1 && state == S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY && floppy_inserted == 1'd0)?
00165                                                             12'd192 :
00166      (osd_line == 5'd1 && state == S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY)?    selected_floppy_addr[11:0] - 12'd96 + 12'd1024 :
00167      
00168      (osd_line == 5'd9 && state == S_SD_ERROR)?             12'd352 :
00169      (state == S_SD_ERROR)?                                 12'd128 :
00170      
00171      (current_addr[12] == 1'b1)?                            12'd128 :
00172      (state == S_SELECT_ROM)?                               current_addr[11:0] + 12'd512 :
00173      
00174      (state != S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY)?                        12'd128 :
00175      
00176      (current_addr[11:0] == 12'd0 && joystick_enable == 1'b0)?
00177                                                             12'd224 :
00178      (current_addr[11:0] == 12'd0 && joystick_enable == 1'b1)?
00179                                                             12'd256 :
00180      
00181      (current_addr[11:0] == 12'd32 && floppy_write_enabled == 1'b0)?
00182                                                             12'd288 :
00183      (current_addr[11:0] == 12'd32 && floppy_write_enabled == 1'b1)?
00184                                                             12'd320 :
00185                                                             
00186      (current_addr[11:0] == 12'd64)?                        12'd352 :
00187      
00188      (current_addr[11:0] == 12'd96 && floppy_inserted == 1'd1)?
00189                                                             12'd384 :
00190      
00191      (floppy_inserted == 13'd0)?                            current_addr[11:0] - 12'd96 + 12'd1024 :
00192      
00193                                                             12'd128
00194                                                             
00195     );
00196     
00197 assign floppy_inserted = (floppy_sector != 32'd0);
00198 assign reset_request = {last_keyboard_select == 1'b0 && keyboard_select == 1'b1 && value_a[3] == 1'b1};
00199 
00200 reg [3:0] state;
00201 parameter [3:0]
00202     S_SD_CHECK_INIT     = 4'd0,
00203     S_SD_ERROR          = 4'd1,
00204     S_READ_INTRO        = 4'd2,
00205     S_READ_INTRO_WAIT   = 4'd3,
00206     S_READ_HEADER       = 4'd4,
00207     S_READ_HEADER_WAIT  = 4'd5,
00208     S_SELECT_ROM        = 4'd6,
00209     S_COPY_ROM          = 4'd7,
00210     S_RUNNING           = 4'd8,
00211     S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY = 4'd9;
00212     
00213 reg [1:0] substate;
00214 
00215 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00216     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00217         CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00218         STB_O <= 1'b0;
00219         ADR_O <= 30'd0;
00220         WE_O <= 1'b0;
00221         master_DAT_O <= 32'd0;
00222         
00223         ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00224         
00225         management_mode <= 1'b1;
00226         pointer <= -8'd7;
00227         selected_floppy_pointer <= -8'd5;
00228         
00229         value_a <= 32'd0;
00230         value_b <= 32'd0;
00231         value_counter <= 2'd0;
00232         last_osd_column <= 5'd0;
00233         
00234         last_keyboard_up <= 1'b0;
00235         last_keyboard_down <= 1'b0;
00236         last_keyboard_select <= 1'b0;
00237         last_request_osd <= 1'b0;
00238         
00239         on_screen_display       <= 1'b1;
00240         joystick_enable         <= 1'b0;
00241         floppy_sector           <= 32'd0;
00242         floppy_write_enabled    <= 1'b0;
00243         
00244         keyboard_counter <= 23'd0;
00245         keyboard_repeating <= 1'b0;
00246         
00247         substate <= 2'd0;
00248         state <= S_SD_CHECK_INIT;
00249     end
00250     else begin
00251         if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && ACK_O == 1'b0) ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00252         else                                                ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00253         
00254         
00255         last_osd_column         <= osd_column;
00256         last_keyboard_up        <= keyboard_up;
00257         last_keyboard_down      <= keyboard_down;
00258         last_keyboard_select    <= keyboard_select;
00259         last_request_osd        <= request_osd;
00260         
00261         if(osd_column == 5'd31 && last_osd_column != 5'd31) value_counter <= 2'd1;
00262         else if(value_counter != 2'd0)                      value_counter <= value_counter + 2'd1;
00263         
00264         if(osd_line == 5'd9 && value_counter == 2'd2) value_a <= char;
00265         if(osd_line == 5'd9 && value_counter == 2'd3) value_b <= char;
00266         
00267         if(keyboard_up == 1'b0 && keyboard_down == 1'b0)    keyboard_repeating <= 1'b0;
00268         else if(keyboard_repeat == 1'b1)                    keyboard_repeating <= 1'b1;
00269         
00270         if((keyboard_up == 1'b1 || keyboard_down == 1'b1) && keyboard_repeat == 1'b0)   keyboard_counter <= keyboard_counter + 21'd1;
00271         else                                                                            keyboard_counter <= 21'd0;
00272         
00273         if(keyboard_up == 1'b1 && (last_keyboard_up == 1'b0 || keyboard_repeat == 1'b1) && value_a[0] == 1'b1 && value_a[1] == 1'b0)
00274             pointer <= pointer - 8'd1;
00275         else if(keyboard_down == 1'b1 && (last_keyboard_down == 1'b0 || keyboard_repeat == 1'b1) && value_a[0] == 1'b1 && value_a[2] == 1'b0)
00276             pointer <= pointer + 8'd1;
00277         else if(state == S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY && last_keyboard_select == 1'b0 && keyboard_select == 1'b1 && value_a[5] == 1'b1 && floppy_inserted == 13'd1)
00278             pointer <= selected_floppy_pointer;
00279         else if(state == S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY && last_keyboard_select == 1'b0 && keyboard_select == 1'b1 && value_a[5] == 1'b1 && floppy_inserted == 13'd0)
00280             pointer <= -8'd4;
00281         
00282         if(floppy_error == 1'b1) begin
00283             CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00284             STB_O <= 1'b0;
00285             
00286             on_screen_display <= 1'b1;
00287             state <= S_SD_ERROR;
00288         end
00289         else if(state == S_SD_CHECK_INIT) begin
00290             if(ACK_I == 1'b1 && CYC_O == 1'b1 && STB_O == 1'b1) begin
00291                 CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00292                 STB_O <= 1'b0;
00293                 
00294                 if(master_DAT_I == 32'd2) begin
00295                     ADR_O <= 30'h4000400; // 0x10001000, base write address
00296                     substate <= 2'd0;
00297                     state <= S_READ_INTRO;
00298                 end
00299                 else if(master_DAT_I == 32'd1) begin
00300                     state <= S_SD_ERROR;
00301                 end
00302             end
00303             else if(ACK_I == 1'b0) begin
00304                 CYC_O <= 1'b1;
00305                 STB_O <= 1'b1;
00306                 WE_O <= 1'b0;
00307                 ADR_O <= 30'h4000400; // 0x10001000, read state
00308             end
00309         end
00310         
00311         else if(state == S_READ_INTRO) begin
00312             if(ACK_I == 1'b1 && CYC_O == 1'b1 && STB_O == 1'b1) begin
00313                 CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00314                 STB_O <= 1'b0;
00315                 
00316                 if(substate < 2'd3) begin
00317                     substate <= substate + 2'd1;
00318                     ADR_O <= ADR_O + 30'd1;
00319                 end
00320                 else begin
00321                     substate <= 2'd0;
00322                     state <= S_READ_INTRO_WAIT;
00323                 end
00324             end
00325             else if(ACK_I == 1'b0) begin
00326                 CYC_O <= 1'b1;
00327                 STB_O <= 1'b1;
00328                 WE_O <= 1'b1;
00329                 //ADR_O <= ADR_O;
00330                 
00331                 master_DAT_O <=
00332                     (substate == 2'd0)? 32'h10180000 :  // base address, 0x10000000
00333                     (substate == 2'd1)? 32'd0 :         // sd sector number
00334                     (substate == 2'd2)? 32'd432 :       // read sector size
00335                     32'd2;                              // start sd read
00336             end
00337         end
00338         else if(state == S_READ_INTRO_WAIT) begin
00339             if(ACK_I == 1'b1 && CYC_O == 1'b1 && STB_O == 1'b1) begin
00340                 CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00341                 STB_O <= 1'b0;
00342                 
00343                 if(master_DAT_I == 32'd2) begin
00344                     ADR_O <= 30'h4000400; // 0x10001000, base write address
00345                     substate <= 2'd0;
00346                     state <= S_READ_HEADER;
00347                 end
00348                 else if(master_DAT_I == 32'd5) begin
00349                     state <= S_SD_ERROR;
00350                 end
00351             end
00352             else if(ACK_I == 1'b0) begin
00353                 CYC_O <= 1'b1;
00354                 STB_O <= 1'b1;
00355                 WE_O <= 1'b0;
00356                 ADR_O <= 30'h4000400; // 0x10001000, read state
00357             end
00358         end
00359         
00360         else if(state == S_READ_HEADER) begin
00361             if(ACK_I == 1'b1 && CYC_O == 1'b1 && STB_O == 1'b1) begin
00362                 CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00363                 STB_O <= 1'b0;
00364                 
00365                 if(substate < 2'd3) begin
00366                     substate <= substate + 2'd1;
00367                     ADR_O <= ADR_O + 30'd1;
00368                 end
00369                 else begin
00370                     substate <= 2'd0;
00371                     state <= S_READ_HEADER_WAIT;
00372                 end
00373             end
00374             else if(ACK_I == 1'b0) begin
00375                 CYC_O <= 1'b1;
00376                 STB_O <= 1'b1;
00377                 WE_O <= 1'b1;
00378                 //ADR_O <= ADR_O;
00379                 
00380                 master_DAT_O <=
00381                     (substate == 2'd0)? 32'h10000200 :  // base address, 0x10000000
00382                     (substate == 2'd1)? 32'd432 :       // sd sector number
00383                     (substate == 2'd2)? 32'd8 :         // read sector size
00384                     32'd2;                              // start sd read
00385             end
00386         end
00387         else if(state == S_READ_HEADER_WAIT) begin
00388             if(ACK_I == 1'b1 && CYC_O == 1'b1 && STB_O == 1'b1) begin
00389                 CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00390                 STB_O <= 1'b0;
00391                 
00392                 if(master_DAT_I == 32'd2) begin
00393                     ADR_O <= 30'h4000400; // 0x10001000, base write address
00394                     substate <= 2'd0;
00395                     state <= S_SELECT_ROM;
00396                 end
00397                 else if(master_DAT_I == 32'd5) begin
00398                     state <= S_SD_ERROR;
00399                 end
00400             end
00401             else if(ACK_I == 1'b0) begin
00402                 CYC_O <= 1'b1;
00403                 STB_O <= 1'b1;
00404                 WE_O <= 1'b0;
00405                 ADR_O <= 30'h4000400; // 0x10001000, read state
00406             end
00407         end
00408         else if(state == S_SELECT_ROM && keyboard_select == 1'b1 && value_a != 32'd0) begin
00409             if(ACK_I == 1'b1 && CYC_O == 1'b1 && STB_O == 1'b1) begin
00410                 CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00411                 STB_O <= 1'b0;
00412                 
00413                 if(substate < 2'd3) begin
00414                     substate <= substate + 2'd1;
00415                     ADR_O <= ADR_O + 30'd1;
00416                 end
00417                 else begin
00418                     substate <= 2'd0;
00419                     state <= S_COPY_ROM;
00420                 end
00421             end
00422             else if(ACK_I == 1'b0) begin
00423                 CYC_O <= 1'b1;
00424                 STB_O <= 1'b1;
00425                 WE_O <= 1'b1;
00426                 //ADR_O <= ADR_O;
00427                 
00428                 master_DAT_O <=
00429                     (substate == 2'd0)? 32'h001C0000 :  // base address, 0x00FC0000
00430                     (substate == 2'd1)? value_b :       // sd sector number
00431                     (substate == 2'd2)? 32'd512 :       // read sector size
00432                     32'd2;                              // start sd read
00433             end
00434         end
00435         else if(state == S_COPY_ROM) begin
00436             if(ACK_I == 1'b1 && CYC_O == 1'b1 && STB_O == 1'b1) begin
00437                 CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00438                 STB_O <= 1'b0;
00439                 
00440                 if(master_DAT_I == 32'd2) begin
00441                     substate <= 2'd0;
00442                     management_mode <= 1'b0;
00443                     on_screen_display <= 1'b0;
00444                     state <= S_RUNNING;
00445                 end
00446                 else if(master_DAT_I == 32'd5) begin
00447                     state <= S_SD_ERROR;
00448                 end
00449             end
00450             else if(ACK_I == 1'b0) begin
00451                 CYC_O <= 1'b1;
00452                 STB_O <= 1'b1;
00453                 WE_O <= 1'b0;
00454                 ADR_O <= 30'h4000400; // 0x10001000, read state
00455             end
00456         end
00457         else if(state == S_RUNNING && last_request_osd == 1'b0 && request_osd == 1'b1) begin
00458             on_screen_display <= 1'b1;
00459             state <= S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY;
00460         end
00461         else if(state == S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY && last_request_osd == 1'b0 && request_osd == 1'b1) begin
00462             on_screen_display <= 1'b0;
00463             state <= S_RUNNING;
00464         end
00465         else if(state == S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY && last_keyboard_select == 1'b0 && keyboard_select == 1'b1 && value_a[4] == 1'b1) begin
00466             joystick_enable <= ~joystick_enable;
00467         end
00468         else if(state == S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY && last_keyboard_select == 1'b0 && keyboard_select == 1'b1 && value_a[6] == 1'b1) begin
00469             floppy_write_enabled <= ~floppy_write_enabled;
00470         end
00471         else if(state == S_ON_SCREEN_DISPLAY && last_keyboard_select == 1'b0 && keyboard_select == 1'b1 && value_a[5] == 1'b1) begin
00472             if(floppy_inserted == 13'd1) begin
00473                 floppy_sector <= 32'd0;
00474             end
00475             else begin
00476                 floppy_sector <= value_b;
00477                 selected_floppy_pointer <= pointer;
00478             end
00479         end
00480     end
00481 end
00482 
00483 endmodule
